body: @hithummah, I personally find that Oda, Toriyama, and ONE have their own charm in their works. But I do agree that this artstyle fits the material well.
I don't like it when doujins change the artsyle of the original work. But I prefer it when the original look shit, sane goes with one-piece and dragonball. Oda and Toriyama's art look shitty to me.
